DOC.brief_summary: Positron emission tomography combine compute tomography use carbon-11 acetate ( ACT PET/CT ) may help detect lesion treatment evaluate response follow therapy patient multiple myeloma ( MM ) . This study aim prospectively assess clinical utility ACT PET/CT MM compare commonly use F18-fluorodeoxyglucose ( FDG ) .
